I only dress up for special occasions because I prefer to be comfortable in my own skin.
i am a woman who wears a size 12.
I love trying new foods from different cultures, but I always come back to my favorite: a big bowl of pasta with marinara sauce.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am good, a little anxious. I just moved into a new place and I dont know anyone around here.
Oh no! I know how that feels. When I first moved to my new place I felt so alone.
Yeah, it feels strange. I'm trying to find ways to meet new people.
I've found that joining a club or group is a great way to meet new people.
That's a good idea! I'll have to look into that.
There's also a great app called Meetup that you can use to find groups in your area.
I've heard of that app! I'll have to download it.
I hope you find some fun groups to join! It really helps to have a sense of community.
Thanks for the advice! I really appreciate it.
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
